content: {"name": "Forgotten Harvest Community Choice Market", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our Community Choice Market Pantry is a shopping market experience for registered clients to select from a wide variety of no-cost groceries. You can pre-register by calling our office, then you can make an appointment to shop at the pantry. All clients **MUST** have an appointment to shop.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.forgottenharvest.org/find-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "15000 Eight Mile West", "address_2": null, "city": "Oak Park", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48237", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4465045, "longitude": -83.1918207}, "phones": [{"number": "(248) 268-7756", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
